item.title: Drupal 8 Contrib Releases: Bootstrap Layouts, Light Skeleton and Casper
item.description: For the past few months I have been playing around with few Drupal 8 projects, which they all are on working state and they are been hosted at Drupal.org. However, I did not consider them all ready for productions meaning they was not polished enough. Here you have three projects that now have a new release and what has changed. Bootstrap Layouts: This project is a combination of Display Suite Bootstrap Layouts and Panels Bootstrap Layouts for Drupal 8.
